events_categories.title: Events in Lebanon
events_categories.description: Lebanon is a small but vibrant country in the Middle East, with a rich history and diverse culture that draws travelers from around the world. From the bustling capital city of Beirut to the ancient Cedars of God and the breathtaking Baalbeck temple, Lebanon has something to offer for every type of traveler. Guests can visit Beirut, home to several historical and cultural sites, including the National Museum of Beirut.

events_categories.title: Events in United Arab Emirates
events_categories.description: The emirates comprise a mixed environment of rocky desert, coastal plains and wetlands, and waterless mountains. The seashore is a haven for migratory waterfowl and draws birdwatchers from all over the world.

events_categories.title: Events in Saudi Arabia
events_categories.description: Saudi Arabia is a destination that offers something for everyone, as it's full of captivating attractions. Guests will love the towering peaks of the Hejaz Mountains and the vast expanses of the Empty Quarter, where they can enjoy the city's panoramic views. Aside from this, nature enthusiasts will love the crystal-clear waters of the infamous Red Sea.

allEvents.title: Baalbeck International Festival
allEvents.description: THE BAALBECK INTERNATIONAL FESTIVAL IS THE OLDEST AND MOST PRESTIGIOUS CULTURAL EVENT IN THE MIDDLE EAST WITH A HISTORY EXCEEDING SIX DECADES.

allEvents.title: Byblos International Festival
allEvents.description: The Byblos International Festival is a Lebanese festival held in Byblos, believed to be the first Phoenician city, founded around 5000 BC. The festival is the biggest in Lebanon, and attracts thousands of tourists from all over the world.

allEvents.title: Ehdeniyat International Festival
allEvents.description: Ehdeniyat International Festival: An annual summer festival during the month of August packed with concerts for National and International artists in addition to many fun activities

allEvents.title: Global Village
allEvents.description: Global Village is a venue, a destination for family entertainment. It offers facilities and options for shopping, dining, recreation and amusement.

allEvents.title: UAE Nation Brand
allEvents.description: People all over the world voted for the ‘7 Lines’ design to be the UAE’s logo for the next 50 years. The logo represents the seven emirates and the seven founding fathers, and complements the slogan ‘Make it Happen’.

allEvents.title: Dubai Shopping Festival
allEvents.description: Do not miss Dubai’s annual mega event, ‘Dubai Shopping Festival’ from 15 December 2022 to 29 January 2023. The festival will feature city-wide incredible retail deals, stunning light and fireworks shows, raffle draws, live entertainment at malls and extra special celebrations on New Year's Eve.

allEvents.title: EXPO Dubai 2022
allEvents.description: Expo 2020 Dubai was the first World Expo to be hosted in the Middle East, Africa and South Asia region. Through the theme of ‘Connecting Minds, Creating the Future’, the event showcased the best examples of collaboration, innovation and cooperation from around the world and inspired people to take a similar path.

allEvents.title: Jet-Ski Experience
allEvents.description: Whether you enjoy spending time with friends or feeling your heartbeat through your chest riding on a jet ski gives you the ultimate experience.

allEvents.title: The Line Exhibition
allEvents.description: You now have the chance to see how it will look for yourself. THE LINE Experience will be hosted at the Diriyah Biennale Foundation - Jax district from the 6th of November 2022. During your visit, you will experience detailed designs, architectural models, and informative films explaining the project in all its glory.

allEvents.title: The Art Library Exhibition
allEvents.description: Misk Art Institute is committed to providing content and context for the Arab art sector through The Art Library: Discovering Arab Artists. This initiative is dedicated to publishing a series of books contextualizing the artistic methods and journeys of prominent Arab artists.

allEvents.title: Brand New Ancient Exhibition
allEvents.description: Brand New Ancients considers how traditions continue to evolve and inform our contemporary lives. Bringing together works by seventeen artists, the exhibition proposes the notion that without innovation traditions die, and without tradition there is nothing to innovate, thus highlighting the role of contemporary art in innovating and expanding our understanding of today’s world.

allEvents.title: Kayaks Experience
allEvents.description: It is a light activity that you can have in the sea to enjoy the weather and soak up the sun.
